Seal characters (1)

斠字的基本解释

斠
jiào
古代量粮食时刮平斗斛的用具：“今人持方木尺平量斗斛曰斗斠。”
古通“校”，校正。

斠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》古岳切，入覺，見。］
［《集韻》居效切，去效，見。］
(1)量谷物时用器具使谷物与斗斛平齐。亦指刮平斗斛的器具。
(2)校订；校正。

斠字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【斗字部】　斠； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页478第22
【廣韻】吉岳切【集韻】【韻會】古岳切【正韻】訖岳切，?音覺。【說文】平斗斛也。【博雅】量也。【玉篇】今作角。　又【集韻】居效切，音敎。義同。

暂无。

measure
Basic explanation of words
measure
jiào
In ancient times, when measuring grain, the utensils of Dendrobium were flattened: "Today people hold a square wooden ruler to measure Dendrobium evenly and call Dendrobium."
Gutong "calibrates" and corrects.
measure
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" Gu Yue cuts, enters consciousness, see. ]
["Ji Yun" is effective and effective, see you. ]
(1) When measuring grains, use utensils to make grains flush with Dendrobium. Also refers to the utensils used to flatten Dendrobium.
(2) Revision; correction.
measure
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Dou Zi Department] 　斠; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 478 22
[Guangyun] Jiyue cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Guyue cut [Zhengyun] Fuyue cut, sound perception. [Said the text] Ping Douhu also. [Bo Ya] The amount is also. [Jade articles] This is a corner.　 [Ji Yun] The effect is cut, the sound is played. The same meaning.
measure
